column4: Hey guys, when I boot, I have a heap of different ubuntu versions. I go to use the janitor and it is empty. No previous versions to delete. Any ideas?
Arrg. Ok thanks nit-wit, guess I'll have to get used to it. I gotta go down 8 options to get to windows lol.
by all means use synaptic.. search for 'linux-image' then uninstall the old versions.
